mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge (title, description, reward_product_id, reward_quantity, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{rewardProductId}, #{rewardQuantity}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, reward_product_id, reward_quantity, status, created_at, updated_at FROM challenge ORDER BY created_at DESC
